title: Google assistant will not download on pixel 4xl
content: I've had my Pixel 4XL for 3 days now. Upon first trying to use Google Assistant, it goes to a window saying it needs an additional download, but every time I hit "start download" it goes to the loading screen then says "An error had occurred. Make sure you're online and try again". I let the phone finish setting up, tried it again, same result. Rebooted, checked for updates, gave it a few days, nothing seems to work. Only other thing I can think of is a reset, but that's my last resort. Any other suggestions?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
